  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminFlightsController
    The class AdminFlightsController is responsible for handling the administration of flights.
    AdminPanelController
    The class AdminPanelController handles the actions of buttons in the administrative panel.
    AdminPassengersController
    The class AdminPassengersController is responsible for the management of passenger data.
    AdminTicketsController
    AdminTicketsController is a JavaFX Controller class that implements the functionalities of adding, updating, and deleting Tickets objects in the database.
    Controller
    Controller class for the main user interface.
    Register
    Register class is responsible for registering a user into the database by creating a new account.
    UserPanelController
    The UserPanelController class is responsible for managing the interactions between the user interface and the backend.
